title: Clavier + v.10.7.0 Portable
description:
Clavier+ 10.7.0 Portable





Download, unzip and use.  It is portable and free.  Enjoy!




Create Custom Hotkeys For Program, Folders And More


Publisher	Guillaume Ryder	
Price	Free
Version	10.7.0  
Last updated	Aug 15, 2016
File Size	544 Kb	
Requirements	None



Clavier+ enables you to to create shortcut keys (hotkeys) for programs, websites, folders, special characters and custom text snippets.
It makes it easy to launch your favorite program or website from your keyboard, without the need to type or click on an icon. In addition, you can use the "Write Text..." option to quickly insert custom text snippets like email signatures and other frequently used text items.
If you often use special characters (e.g. different languages), you can use Clavier+ to insert these as well, no need to use the Windows Character map.
Other features include and option to limit hotkeys to certain programs, activation conditions (e.g. NumLock key must be on), as well as support for delays and special commands.





Reality Ascent by Dragan Glavasic
Wake up!


76677
